snippet: The king of Saudi Arabia inserted himself directly into the Syria crisis on Friday, castigating Russia and China for vetoing a United Nations Security Council resolution.
lead_paragraph: The king of Saudi Arabia inserted himself directly into the Syria crisis on Friday, castigating Russia and China for vetoing a United Nations Security Council resolution.

headline.main: In Rare, Blunt Speech, Saudi King Criticizes Syria Vetoes
headline.print_headline: In Rare, Blunt Speech, Saudi King Criticizes Syria Vetoes
